channel.title: Need help to run first server
channel.description:
hello how do i get my no=ip to work for my server im brand new to coding and i feel like im doing somethign wrong because i really cant log in no matter what i do my port forwarding is coorect and i have a no-ip account but i dont know how to set it for my server so i can log in please explain to me what i need to do upon downloading a untouched source plus client
i have added 0.0.0.0 to both client server = values this is what i get now when i try to load the client the cache is in users folder i get this error [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2nvrp1c.png[/img]can you please help me out my no-ip is correct i changed the no-ip on the gui file what else do i have to do? the ip is set to 0.0.0.0 at both server = values

item.title: Need help to run first server
item.dc:creator: @garion2012 garion2012
item.description:
@garion2012 wrote:

i hvae port forwarded right it shows on canuseeme.org i need help with the error what do i have to do and by setting my server = to 0.0.0.0 is that what i need to do can some one who takes there time to read this please help me?

Read full topic

did you even read the error? maybe if you do you will see what the problem is, it has nothing to do with you changing the ip
